name: Homeless & Dog
description:
Take on the role of a homeless man who has only 7 days to collect the appropriate raw materials to buy medicine for his dog, while ensuring that he has something to eat, drink and to be warm even in snow or rain.

WARNING! THE GAME TAKES A LONG LOAD BECAUSE IT HAS A LOT OF SOUNDS (200mb of game!)

Liluo: https://liluo.io/brudda/homeless-and-dog

Keybinds (only PC):

MovementInteractionW, S, A, D or arrowsE
